OOC: Hellbeast Discard the attack post just for the simple fact that that I 
know when I'm busy and have other things on my mind. My Combat thinking and 
skill suffers so I give you that respect as well. But when I come for your 
heads as well as Oblitertron's, Zardus's, KitKat's, Childs's, and if need be 
Iron Raptors's heads. I want those battles to have ((Honor)) so when I do 
win there can be nothing said but Koj fought like a hungry wolf and won like 
a hero. This is Ryo's choice Koj would stay there and beat the ..... and 
.... well you picture.

::Koj::

Koj Climbs on Inu-Yasha back "Hellbeast Concern yourself with becoming a 
worthy enemy for me Inu-Yasha lets go home."

::Inu-Yasha::
"A worthy enemy for us." Inu-Yasha takes off towards the Cf "Koj I have a 
question?"

::Koj::
"What?"

::Inu-Yasha::
"Do you think its true that creatures go through life helping others or 
needing help themselves?"

::Koj::
"huh"
